textAfterTable: 1979-80 29 year-old forwards: Player GP G A Pts PPG Gil Perreault 80 40 66 106 1.33 Darryl Sittler 73 40 57 97 1.33 Ulf Nilsson 50 14 44 58 1.16 Reggie Leach 76 50 26 76 1.00 As you can see, Nilsson missed a significant amount of time due to injuries both seasons. But his PPG indicates that his offence wasn't very far behind that of his two comparables age-wise, Perreault and Sittler, both of whom will certainly make the top-60 list. Nilsson was primarily a passer, and his numbers likely suffered from not having a Bobby Hull on his line in New York (though that could also mean that Hull's presence helped inflate his WHA stats).
